Title: The Thrushes (No. 53)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Daniel Knauf (teleplay by), Daniel Knauf (story by), Dave Metzger (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: When Alexander Kirk contracts a mysterious group that specializes in hacking the world's most secure computer systems, Red and Liz see an opportunity to make a move on Kirk's organization.
